net.proteusframework.core.automation

Class SQLStatementEditor

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport
      • net.proteusframework.core.automation.SQLStatementEditor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyEditor

    public class SQLStatementEditor
extends java.beans.PropertyEditorSupport
    PropertyEditor.

    Format of String is [Description];[SQL]
    Any semicolons in the description must be escaped with another semicolon.

    Example 1:

    • This statement updates the foo table to include the parent_id from the bar table.;UPDATE foo SET parent_id = (SELECT parent_id FROM bar WHERE id = foo.bar_id)

    Example 2:

    • This statement updates the foo table to include the parent_id from the bar table;; good luck!.;UPDATE foo SET parent_id = (SELECT parent_id FROM bar WHERE id = foo.bar_id)

    NOTE: This is for SpringFramework 2.5.x support.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
